Text: I think the reason for the "premature" device closure is that you need to call "snd_pcm_drain(handle);" prior to "snd_pcm_close(handle);" to ensure that all data is played before the device is closed.

I think the reason for the "premature" device closure is that you need to call `snd_pcm_drain(handle);` prior to `snd_pcm_close(handle);` to ensure that all data is played before the device is closed.
